# Changelog

All notable changes to VneCommon will be documented in this file.

## [0.1.0] - 2025-01-24

### Added
- Platform detection macros (Windows, macOS, iOS, visionOS, Android, Linux, Web)
- Compiler detection macros (MSVC, GCC, Clang)
- Architecture detection macros (x64, x86, ARM64, ARM)
- Assertion macros (`VNE_ASSERT`, `VNE_ASSERT_MSG`, `VNE_ENSURE`, `VNE_ENSURE_MSG`)
- Utility macros (`VNE_UNUSED`, `VNE_FORCE_INLINE`, `VNE_LIKELY`, `VNE_UNLIKELY`, `VNE_DEPRECATED`)
- CMake header-only library configuration
- Example program demonstrating all features
- CI pipeline for Linux, macOS, and Windows
- Build scripts for all platforms
